00054 void FunctionSim::getObservation(Observation& obs) {
00055 
00056     // Move to next point
00057     x = MINX + (random()/(double)RAND_MAX)*(MAXX-MINX);
00058 
00059     obs.getFeatures()(0,0) = 1.0;
00060     obs.getFeatures()(1,0) = x;
00061     //obs.getFeatures()(2,0) = 1.0;//x*x;
00062     //std::cout<<"x = "<<obs.getFeatures()<<std::endl;
00063    
00064 }

00072 int FunctionSim::doAction(Vector& action) {
00073 
00074     double y = action[0];
00075 
00076     switch (function) {
00077     case CONST: 
00078         error = 0.75 - y;
00079         break;
00080     case LINE:
00081         error = (-0.5*x + 0.5) - y;
00082         break;
00083     case SINE: 
00084         error = std::sin(x*M_PI) - y;
00085         break;
00086     case SQR:
00087         //error = x*x - y;
00088         error = x*x; // just for olbfgs
00089         break;
00090     case EXP:
00091         error = exp(x) - y;
00092         break;
00093     case NEG_TANH:
00094         error = -tanh(x) - y;
00095         break;
00096     case SINC:
00097         error = ((x!=0)?std::sin(x*4*M_PI)/(x*4):0.0) - y;
00098         break;
00099     case INV:
00100         error = 1/(x+2) - y;
00101         break;
00102     case LOG:
00103         error = std::log(x + 1.1) - y;
00104         break;
00105     default:
00106         std::cout<<"Unknown function";
00107 
00108     }
00109 
00110  
00111     return 0;
00112 }
